solution_line_template: Perry added {fat_per_cup} / {cream_cup_divisor} = <<{fat_per_cup}/{cream_cup_divisor}={total_fat_added}>>{total_fat_added} grams of fat to the recipe.
Thus, he added {total_fat_added} / {number_of_servings} = <<{total_fat_added}/{number_of_servings}={fat_per_serving}>>{fat_per_serving} grams of fat to each serving of food.
